data.title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time credits (Windows, 2003)
data.meta_description: The official game credits for Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time released on Windows in 2003. The credits include 281 people.
data.text:
MobyPro Early Access

People credited on this game were also credited on:

Prince of Persia: Warrior Within, a group of 124 people

Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones, a group of 93 people

Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory, a group of 76 people

Assassin's Creed, a group of 69 people

Assassin's Creed (Director's Cut Edition), a group of 67 people

[ Upgrade to MobyPro to view more! ]

MobyPro Early Access

In addition to this game, these people were also credited on other games:

Yves Guillemot on 562 other games

Yuri Lowenthal on 387 other games

Christine Burgess-Quémard on 371 other games

Tony Key on 371 other games

Serge Hascoët on 360 other games
